backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor placeholder with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two UI requirements to the App.tsx file and related components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Stored summaries describing key frontend files such as App.tsx, CashApp modal, global styles, and Tailwind config.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining extensive color tokens and theming for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell containing the root div and loading the main React entrypoint.

frontend/src/components/CashAppInstructi: Modal guiding users through sending a $45 Cash App payment, including copy-to-clipboard and Escape key handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and auth lifecycle.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind stylesheet defining refined monochrome light and dark themes and base typography utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entrypoint initializing QueryClient, Internet Identity provider, and rendering the App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom colors, animations, fonts, container settings, and typography/container-queries/animate plugins.
